meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Beverly Feldman Keith Lewis Mark McDermott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #984.

td.p: Beverly Feldman, a librarian from Amherst, New York
Keith Lewis, a manager from Allison Park, Pennsylvania
Mark McDermott, an editorial writer originally from Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,801)

tr.td: PREHISTORIC TIMES
MAGAZINES
POT LUCK
THE QUEEN'S ENGLISH
MOVIE PRINCES
MARY ELLEN SAYS
(Alex: But right now, I'm more concerned with what Mark says.)

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue
